articles.title: “Ghostly” – Scientists Discover Mysterious Creature From the Shadows in Australia - SciTechDaily
articles.description: In the sun-baked Pilbara region of northwestern Australia, researchers have discovered a mysterious creature from the shadows – a new ant species of the elusive genus Leptanilla. The new species, Leptanilla voldemort – L. voldemort for short – is a pale ant w…
articles.content: In Australia’s Pilbara region, a new ant species, Leptanilla voldemort, has been discovered. It is characterized by its pale, slender form and underground habitat, shedding light on the unique biodiv… [+4732 chars]

articles.title: All iPhone Models Will Use On-Device Processing For The First Wave Of AI Features In iOS 18, As Apple Will Not Rely On Cloud Servers - Wccftech
articles.description: iOS 18's first wave of AI features will be handled on-device as latest report suggests that cloud server reliance will not be available.
articles.content: iOS 18 is reported to be Apple's biggest update for the iPhone as the company is planning a range of new AI-related functionalities on a system level. There have been numerous reports highlighting ho… [+2335 chars]

articles.author: Harsh Upadhyay
articles.title: Byju's India CEO Arjun Mohan resigns as edtech firm splits biz into three divisions - Entrackr
articles.description: Arjun Mohan, the CEO of Byju’s India operations, has stepped down from his position seven months after joining the edtech firm.
